subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Willie Randolph said the Mets had learned “a tough life lesson in baseball,” his euphemism for what a team finds out when it cannot protect a seven-game lead in the middle of September.
snippet: Willie Randolph said the Mets had learned “a tough life lesson in baseball,” his euphemism for what a team finds out when it cannot protect a seven-game lead in the middle of September.
